name: Try-Catch错误处理
example: try { const result = JSON.parse(data); } catch (error) { console.error('Parse error:', error); }

name: Try-Catch-Finally
description: 捕获错误后总是执行的清理逻辑
example: try { const file = await readFile(path); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } finally { if (file) file.close(); }

name: 按错误类型处理
description: 根据错误类型执行不同的处理逻辑
template: catch (error) { switch (error.type) { case '{type1}': {handle1}; break; case '{type2}': {handle2}; break; default: {default}; } }
example: catch (error) { switch (error.code) { case 'NOT_FOUND': showNotFound(); break; case 'UNAUTHORIZED': showUnauthorized(); break; default: showError(error); } }

name: Catch捕获所有错误
example: catch (error) { console.error('Unexpected error:', error); notifyAdmin(error); }

name: 抛出错误
description: 主动抛出错误以便上层处理
example: throw new Error('Invalid input: ' + value);

name: 抛出自定义错误
description: 创建并抛出自定义错误类
template: class {ErrorName} extends Error { constructor(message) { super(message); this.name = '{ErrorName}'; } } throw new {ErrorName}({message});
example: class ValidationError extends Error { constructor(message) { super(message); this.name = 'ValidationError'; } } throw new ValidationError('Invalid user data');

name: Catch并重新抛出
description: 捕获错误后记录日志并重新抛出
example: catch (error) { console.error('API Error:', error); throw error; }

name: 错误翻译
description: 将内部错误转换为用户友好的消息
template: catch (error) { const message = {errorMap}[error.code] || 'An error occurred'; return message; }
example: catch (error) { const message = errorMap[error.code] || 'Something went wrong'; showToast(message); }

name: 错误恢复
example: try { data = await fetch('/api/data'); } catch (error) { data = getDefaultData(); }

name: 错误重试
template: let retries = 0; while (retries < maxRetries) { try { return await {action}; } catch (error) { if (++retries >= maxRetries) throw error; } }
example: let retries = 0; while (retries < 3) { try { return await fetch(url); } catch (error) { if (++retries >= 3) throw error; } }

name: 404错误处理
template: catch (error) { if (error.response?.status === 404) { return null; } throw error; }
example: catch (error) { if (error.response?.status === 404) { return null; } throw error; }

name: 401错误处理
example: catch (error) { if (error.response?.status === 401) { redirectToLogin(); } throw error; }

name: 403错误处理
template: catch (error) { if (error.response?.status === 403) { showToast('Access denied'); return; } throw error; }
example: catch (error) { if (error.response?.status === 403) { showToast('Access denied'); return; } throw error; }

name: 500错误处理
template: catch (error) { if (error.response?.status >= 500) { logToErrorTracking(error); notifyAdmin(error); } throw error; }
example: catch (error) { if (error.response?.status >= 500) { logToErrorTracking(error); notifyAdmin(error); } throw error; }

name: 网络错误处理
template: catch (error) { if (!navigator.onLine) { showToast('You are offline'); return null; } throw error; }
example: catch (error) { if (!navigator.onLine) { showToast('You are offline'); return null; } throw error; }

name: 未知错误处理
example: catch (error) { console.error('Unexpected error:', error); showToast('Something went wrong'); return defaultData; }

name: 错误日志记录
description: 捕获错误并记录到控制台
example: catch (error) { console.error('[API] Error:', error); console.trace(error); notifyAdmin(error); }

name: UI错误显示
example: catch (error) { showErrorToUI(error); logToErrorTracking(error); }

name: 验证错误处理
example: catch (error) { if (error.name === 'ValidationError') { showFormErrors(error.fields); } else { showError('Invalid submission'); } }

name: JSON解析错误
template: catch (error) { console.error('JSON parse error:', error); return null; }
example: try { return JSON.parse(data); } catch (error) { console.error('JSON parse error:', error); return null; }
